name: John HOLLAWELL, Appellant v. Frank D. GILLIS, Superintendent SCI Coal Township and William Ward, PBPP Chairman, and PBPP Members, et. al., Appellees

parties: John HOLLAWELL, Appellant v. Frank D. GILLIS, Superintendent SCI Coal Township and William Ward, PBPP Chairman, and PBPP Members, et. al., Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 27th day of June, 2001, the direct appeal is quashed; the matter is treated as a Petition for Allowance Of Appeal and is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
777 A.2d 412
John HOLLAWELL, Appellant v. Frank D. GILLIS, Superintendent SCI Coal Township and William Ward, PBPP Chairman, and PBPP Members, et. al., Appellees.
No. 55 M.D. Appeal Docket 2001.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 27, 2001.
